snippet: Shares of Caesars, which were priced at $9 on Tuesday, nearly doubled on Wednesday, as the casino company, which was taken private in a 2008 leveraged buyout, returned to the public markets.
abstract: Shares of Caesars, which were priced at $9 on Tuesday, nearly doubled on Wednesday, as the casino company, which was taken private in a 2008 leveraged buyout, returned to the public markets.
